text: Roland DePaul is an American former ice hockey center who played for Minnesota in the 1940s. ==Career== DePaul was one of a bevy of American players to come from Eveleth in the 1940s, eventually making his way onto Minnesota under the guidance of Larry Armstrong. DePaul played three seasons for the Gophers, leading the team in scoring each campaign. He was named team captain for his senior season and inducted into the Minnesota Athletic Hall of Fame in 2015. ==Statistics== ===Regular season and playoffs=== {| border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="0" style="text-align:center; width:60em" |- bgcolor="#e0e0e0" ! colspan="3" bgcolor="#ffffff" | ! rowspan="99" bgcolor="#ffffff" | ! colspan="5" | Regular season ! rowspan="99" bgcolor="#ffffff" | ! colspan="5" | Playoffs |- bgcolor="#e0e0e0" !
